dict.string: A Jewel sparkles when it is hit by a Beam that matches its color, or by a combination of Beams that together match its color.
A Jewel sparkles when it is hit by a Beam that matches its color, or by a combination of Beams that together match its color.
A Jewel sparkles when it is hit by a Beam that matches its color, or by a combination of Beams that together match its color.
A Puzzle is solved when every Jewel sparkles.
A Puzzle is solved when every Jewel sparkles.
A Puzzle is solved when every Jewel sparkles.
Solid Beams make these Jewels sparkle.
Solid Beams make these Jewels sparkle.
Solid Beams make these Jewels sparkle.
Combinations of Red, Green and Blue Beams make these Jewels sparkle.
Combinations of Red, Green and Blue Beams make these Jewels sparkle.
Combinations of Red, Green and Blue Beams make these Jewels sparkle.
Puzzles are played on a grid.
Make every Jewel Sparkle!Drag the Mirror into the Red Beam
Make every Jewel Sparkle!Drag the Mirror into the Red Beam
Make every Jewel Sparkle! Drag the Mirror into the Red Beam
Make every Jewel Sparkle! Drag the Mirror into the Red Beam
Lasers and Jewels are located around the edges of the grid.

Place Mirrors on the grid to steer the right color Beams to each Jewel.

This Mirror reflects the green Beam onto the green Jewel. The Puzzle is solved!

Tap the Mirror to rotate it into position.
Mirrors are not the only kind of object you can place on the grid...
Great! Now let's try a Beam Splitter.
Great! Now let's try a Beam Splitter.
Great! Now let's try a Beam Splitter.

Beamsplitters can reflect, split and combine Beams.

Finally let's try using a Prism.
Excellent - you made both Blue Jewels Sparkle! Let's try a Prism.

Excellent - you made both Blue Jewels Sparkle! Let's try a Prism.
Prisms bend each color of Beam differently.

Prisms are used to combine colored Beams and to split them apart.
